Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "With Nanami's final touch, power flows through the facility, bringing its systems back to life."}
{3: 'Nanami lets out a long breath, hesitates for a moment, then speaks tentatively.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hi there, Mecha Babushka!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "You've come."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'The one named "Nanami", I have calculated the probability of your return.'}
{3: 'Having gone through all that she has, Nanami now feels at ease hearing this familiar voice.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Since you already knew that I'd come, Mecha Babushka, can you give me the answers I've been looking for?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Incorrect assumption. I merely calculated, based on previous data, that there was a high probability you would return here to connect with me. Your specific purpose remains unknown.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Have you decided to lead the mechanoids down the path of awakened machines?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nope! I'm sure you know what's going on out there, Mecha Babushka!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I came with more data and variables! Let's start a new simulation!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami wants to see how these data points and variables will reshape this world!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "I'm sorry, Nanami."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "Gestalt is dedicating all resources to Babylonia's Project Departure. The remaining computing power is insufficient to initiate another real-time simulation."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Excessive simulations hold no value in problem-solving. When a problem has infinite solutions, it effectively has none at all.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'How... am I supposed to figure out the answers to my questions, then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "The awakened machines are the answer to Earth's catastrophe."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Humans only have a 0.072% chance to survive the Punishing disaster. Awakened machines are the only answer to Punishing.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "There's no time left, Nanami."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's not true, Mecha Babushka.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I remember that time clearly. That time when you first asked me to come here...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Humans only have a 0.031% chance to survive the Punishing disaster. Awakened machines are the only answer to Punishing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The decimal points are changing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'A whole <color=#ff4e4eff>0.041%</color> higher!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silence fills the space for a moment.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'We are both mechanical consciousnesses. You know the probability of these numbers.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'To give you your answer, I will allocate some spare computing power to run a simple simulation for you.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'These numbers will show you exactly what will become of human civilization.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I didn't know we could do that! That's amazing!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'After a brief notification ping, a virtual screen materializes before Nanami.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab'}
{1: 'Gestalt: Please input your known variables.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Nanami: mutated Red Tide, Chaos, and mechanoids staying on Earth.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '<color=#ff4e4eff>Gestalt: 5475 days later</color>, Babylonia initiates Project Departure, with mechanoids remaining within Aerospace City.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 11680 days later, humans and mechanoids wage war over limited resources.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory569.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_05.jpg'}

{1: '<color=#ff4e4eff>Gestalt: 12775 days later, Chaos disappears,</color> the mutated Red Tide assaults human settlements as a frost wave descends.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading30.jpg'}

{1: 'Gestalt: 13870 days later, a new Red Tide consciousness emerges, and the last human falls to the Red Tide.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 14601 days later, the mutated Red Tide engulfs Earth completely.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Damn it... This can't be possible...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alright... Let's try another one!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's go with the status quo: mechanoids embark on a space journey while humans remain on Earth!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: '—Starting Simulation—'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 8760 days later, mechanoids complete their starship construction and depart from Earth.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory582.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1084.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 12775 days later, Chaos disappears, and the mutated Red Tide launches its counterattack.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory578.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}

{1: 'Gestalt: 13502 days later, the ground falls into an ever-winter as a frost wave overwhelms multiple human settlements.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 14608 days later, the mutated Red Tide engulfs Earth completely.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{1: "Snow and the crimson-white pattern of Red Tide blanket the planet's surface.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "This can't be right...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "Gestalt's calculations are never wrong."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's give it another try, Mecha Babushka!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's go with the status quo: humans and mechanoids leave Earth together!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: '—Starting Simulation—'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 5475 days later, Babylonia initiates Project Departure.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 8760 days later, mechanoids complete their starship construction and depart from Earth.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 12769 days later—■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: ■■■■ days later, Babylonia encounters mechanoids in space ■■■■■the Punishing■■■', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "...Mecha Babushka?! What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Corrupted codes spread across Gestalt's deduction data."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Time span too extensive. Unable to provide detailed calculation process.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "The Punishing Virus will inevitably catch up to humanity's spacecraft."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'When ■■■■ came to this place and opened the unknown technological black box, the fate of human civilization was already sealed.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'This is the only possible outcome my calculations can derive.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Then... let's try another variable! What if we factor in the Ascendants...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 7289 days later, the mutated Red Tide consumes the Ascendants.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory578.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}

{1: 'Gestalt: 13476 days later, the surface falls into the Ever-Winter as a frost wave overwhelms multiple human settlements.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 14608 days later, the mutated Red Tide engulfs Earth completely.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "No, not this one... Let's try another one!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory578.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.7', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}

{1: 'Gestalt: 13,486 days later, the ground falls into an ever-winter as a frost wave overwhelms multiple human settlements.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 14625 days later, the mutated Red Tide engulfs Earth completely.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "There's still a margin of error... Let's try this one instead!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Gestalt: 14658 days later, the mutated Red Tide engulfs Earth completely.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After countless simulation attempts, Nanami sits on the ground, completely exhausted.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Then... then what if we add the scenario where Commandant leaves the tower?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Invalid hypothesis.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Among the 262,537,412,640,768,743 worlds simulated by Gestalt, not a single one begins with this hypothesis.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But what if Commandant really does come out?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silence fills the virtual space once more.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Invalid hypothesis.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'B-but that girl in the Red Tide clearly said Commandant had already left!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory223.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaos', 3: '【kuroname】... left the Hetero Tower.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "—Unable to calculate the exact time of 【kuroname】's departure from the Hetero Tower. Therefore, the hypothesis is invalid. Unable to begin simulation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So there are things beyond your calculation, Mecha Babushka!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "Be it mechanoids or humans, there must be things that we can't see."}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "But no matter how many simulations are run, humanity's fate is sealed—"}
{3: 'Human civilization will ultimately perish in an Ever-Winter.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I see what it is now! It's not that such a possibility doesn't exist—it's that the possibility exists beyond your calculation, Mecha Babushka!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: "That's one way to see it, but the optimal solution remains the same—you're leading the awakened machines to preserve Earth's civilization."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't want that at all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Be it mechanoids or humans, there must be things that we can't see.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "We're all civilizations born from Earth. Of course we should stand together, united as one to overcome this catastrophe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The awakened machines originated from humans. No one can stay for sure the mechanoids would be spared if the Punishing Virus catches up to humanity's ships.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: '—The mechanoid called "Nanami"... your level of awakening has exceeded my computational parameters.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'I am unable to compute the possibility you speak of.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Perhaps in the future, when you possess greater computing power, you will be able to simulate a world with such possibilities.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Time is running short now. My computing power is limited, and I must devote all resources to Project Departure. I can no longer assist you with these simulations.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Make your own choice, Nanami.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Gestalt severs the connection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Which means... there's still hope!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami narrows her eyes to review every piece of information.'}
{3: 'Information from Chaos, from Ishmael, from Gestalt...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '【kuroname】 must have left the Hetero Tower, but no one knows at which point in time they emerge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Gestalt cannot calculate when exactly 【kuroname】 left the Hetero Tower, yet it never outright said Commandant didn't make it out...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And there is this thing that Ishmael said...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_07.jpg'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Perhaps the "variable" you\'re hoping for is already taking notice of your wish.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But... no one knows where that single thread leading to destiny truly lies.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_17.jpg'}
{3: "The singularity might indeed exist. The probability of human civilization's survival has gone from 0.031% to 0.072%."}
{3: 'Such a minuscule probability feels too fragile to be real, too slight for her to believe it could actually exist.'}
{3: 'Transparent spider silk floats in the ocean, disappearing as soon as you look away.'}
{3: 'She might truly grasp this thread of fate, but likewise, no one knows what lies at its end.'}
{3: 'And now...'}

{3: 'On the brink of her predetermined future and forced to flee into deep space, a girl soon to be exiled from Earth—what can she still do for Earth, for humanity, and for the commandant in these moments?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 4: '5'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Huh?! Who's that? Did someone just say something?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'That sounds like Commandant... hmm...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Both the terminal and life radar remain silent. If Commandant had sent a message, at least one of them would have triggered the notification sound I'd set for them."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well, I guess I'm just hearing things.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She scratches her ear, looking somewhat embarrassed.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Guess I should really start thinking about what to do next.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If Commandant comes when I'm gone... what should I leave behind for Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Human food! That's definitely essential, though it might be hard to preserve... and serum, yes!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm... Equipment, repair supplies—I need to stock up on all of these.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl stands in the snow as she stares into the unreachable distance.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'I wonder if I could leave a piece of "myself" for Commandant.', 3: '60'}
{3: 'I wonder if I could leave a piece of "myself" for Commandant.'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 3: "Following Gestalt's guidance, I will become the Nanami of the future and the Sage of mechanical civilization and lead them toward potential new dimensions of existence.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: "I will integrate myself as the starship's core, become the Gestalt of mechanical civilization, and guide them to discover the meaning of their awakening.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'Please forgive me for having this small moment of selfishness.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When I become the one and only Sage of the mechanical race—', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'Please allow me to leave Nanami behind—for humanity and Commandant.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
